Computer.name: GP Test Node
Computer.PFPorts: ssh_v2:10022:SSH_V2 ftp_v2:10021:FTP_V2 web_v2:10080:Web_V2 ssh_v3:20022:SSH_V3 ftp_v3:20021:FTP_V3 web_v3:20080:Web_V3
Computer.file:
GP Test Node — M1
Crack sequence: 1. overload (proxy) 2. analyze / solve GATEKEEPER (firewall) 3. SSHcrack / FTPBounce / WebServerWorm (vanilla ports) 4. SSHcrack_v2 / FTPBounce_v2 / WebServerWorm_v2 (V2 ports) 5. SSHcrack_v3 / FTPBounce_v3 / WebServerWorm_v3 (V3 ports — needs key files) 6. porthack
V3 key files are in your /home from session start for M1 testing.
